body_html: Actually I just realized that it's not only broadcast, but the whole replicate part. In nvvp the broadcast part takes 82ms, but there are still 120ms of other stuff that we do afterwards and before we start forward (I haven't finished annotating the trace yet).
body_text: Actually I just realized that it's not only broadcast, but the whole replicate part. In nvvp the broadcast part takes 82ms, but there are still 120ms of other stuff that we do afterwards and before we start forward (I haven't finished annotating the trace yet).
body: Actually I just realized that it's not only broadcast, but the whole `replicate` part. In `nvvp` the broadcast part takes 82ms, but there are still 120ms of other stuff that we do afterwards and before we start forward (I haven't finished annotating the trace yet).
